name: Anna Nox
description: Anna Noxis aMoxleader and manager of a Mox warehouse on Longshore North, she sufferedcyberpsychosisupon experiencing abraindancefeaturing the suffering and death of a Mox protectee. Anna worked atLizzie's Barand managed a nearby Mox warehouse. Following the death of a fellow Mox, she commenced with her own private investigation into the crime that had taken place. Starting with anXBD, Anna's associateLil Bex, contracted the crack-BD-tunerHal Cantos.
